property.name: text
property.value: This model requires audio files at: https://www.terraswarm.org/accessors/wiki/Main/WhatMoCs?

property.name: text
property.value: Verse start times are now specified.

property.name: text
property.value:
This model presents a further timed approach to a real-time accessor composition problem.
In addition to verse start times, the end time of each inserted sound clip is now specified. The SingleEvent actors stop each animal sound clip at a specific time, then trigger the next verse clip.
The MicrostepDelay actor ensures that each verse clip starts logically after the end of each animal sound clip, even though the stop/start occur at the same wall clock time. The MicrostepDelays provides a deterministic ordering of events.
This model does not handle any faults.
The song is "The Fox (What Does The Fox Say?) by Ylvis http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Fox_%28What_Does_the_Fox_Say%3F%29 The animal sounds are from SeaWorld: http://seaworld.org/en/animal-info/animal-sounds/

property.name: text
property.value: Please turn your speakers on :) Requires Java 1.8
